Module othellobot
Package othellobot

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • othellobot.Board
  • public class Board
extends Object
    The board class represents the Othello game board and all of it's functions that players can interact with.
    Since:
    2019-08-29
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Austin Howard

      • receiveMove

        public void receiveMove​(String move)
        Method to receive a formatted move, update the move, then call a function to flip necessary pieces.
        Parameters:
        move - String that indicates color, column, row in format (EX, (B) a 2)

      • updateBoard

        public void updateBoard​(int playerColorInt,
                        int column,
                        int row)
        Method that finds all of the necessary flips whenever a move is made by a player.
        Parameters:
        playerColorInt - color of the move
        column - column of the move
        row - row of the move

      • formatMove

        public String formatMove​(int[] move,
                         int playerColorInt)
        Method to format moves.
        Parameters:
        move - two item integer list [columnNumber,rowNumber]
        playerColorInt - color of player making the move
        Returns:
        appropriately formatted move

      • gameOver

        public boolean gameOver()
        Method for checking to see if there are no moves left to make on the board.
        Returns:
        boolean for whether the board is full or not full

      • getScore

        public int[] getScore()
        Method to calculate the score of the board.
        Returns:
        two item integer list [blackPlayerScore,whitePlayerScore]
